item.description:
Hello Everyone!

Here's a chance to hang out and chat with fellow members of the group over some Mexican food and drink! http://www.bordercafe...

The one problem might be parking. Street parking is possible, if you're lucky. There is at least one garage to park (for a fee).

Of course, it's accessible by public transportation.

I know some of you will be headed back from a day in Paxton at Kettlebrook.

I spoke with one of the restaurant staff and they said meeting at an earlier time (like this) will be good for large groups.

I'm putting this out there now to see how many can make it. If it's not a good day for most, then we can move it to another day/time/location.

Hopefully, it'll work!

See ya,

Jon

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Group Social at The Border Cafe (Harvard Square)
